newsitem.title: FRANCE: Suez plans special div, gives no amount.
newsitem.headline: Suez plans special div, gives no amount.

text.p: Cie de Suez said on Tuesday it planned to pay an exceptional dividend in June to reflect the capital gains it made on the sale of its investment bank Banque Indosuez last year.
A spokeswoman for Suez declined to comment on the amount of the dividend.

"The board agreed on the principle of an exceptional dividend to take account of the capital gain to the parent company made during the sale of Banque Indosuez," it said in a statement with its 1996 results.
The dividend would be paid entirely in cash on June 26, 1997.
The statement also said its board had unanimously approved in principle a merger with utilities group Lyonnaise des Eaux.
Shareholders in Suez are expected to ask for a special payout to win their backing for the merger.
